author: Юра Саруханян
comment: This watch face is literally awesome. Indicators work and I love the choice between analog and digital formats. Well done

author: Armen Karapetyan
comment: I like the minimalist and elegant look. Also love the customisation feature. Well done!
title: Nice minimalist design

author: Thomas Doebler
comment: The mini dials in the analog accessories are not aligned with the rings! Please let me know if there is a fix...
title: Dials screwy

author: JD924
comment: Better looking, better readability, more appealing since the update. I like the more customization given to the app. Very happy.
title: Much better with the update

author: Георги Ангелов
comment: Look awesome! I like the design and the colors!

author: Joseph Loria
comment: The arms on the small dials are all misaligned on the LG G Watch. All arms are down and to the right of center.
title: Misaligned
